# Databricks Instructions

- When the user asks to run Databricks commands, always use the Databricks CLI (`databricks` command)
- Do not use the Databricks REST API directly unless specifically requested
- Prefer CLI commands over other methods for Databricks operations including:
  - Workspace operations
  - Job management
  - Cluster operations
  - File system (DBFS) operations
  - Secrets management
  - Unity Catalog operations
- Always use the terminal to execute Databricks CLI commands
- Ensure the Databricks CLI is properly configured before running commands
